001import java.util.HashMap;
002/**
003 * DÃ©crivez votre classe ItemList ici.
004 *
005 * @author Pierre MATAR
006 * @version 2
007 */
008public class ItemList
009{
010    private HashMap<String, Item> aItemList;
011    
012    /**
013 * Constructs an ItemList with an empty collection of items.
014 */
015    public ItemList() {
016        this.aItemList = new HashMap<>();
017    }
018    /**
019 * Adds an item to the collection.
020 * 
021 * @param pItem The item to add to the collection.
022 */
023  
024       public void addItem(final Item pItem) {
025        this.aItemList.put(pItem.getName(), pItem);
026    }
027    /**
028 * Retrieves an item from the collection by its name.
029 * 
030 * @param pItemName The name of the item to retrieve.
031 * @return The item if found; otherwise, null.
032 */
033    public Item getItem(final String pItemName) {
034        return this.aItemList.get(pItemName);
035    }
036    /**
037 * Removes an item from the collection by its name.
038 * 
039 * @param pItemName The name of the item to remove.
040 */
041    
042    public void removeItem(final String pItemName) {
043        this.aItemList.remove(pItemName);
044    }
045    /**
046 * Returns a string representation of all items in the collection.
047 * The format of the string depends on whether the items belong to a room
048 * or a player's inventory.
049 * 
050 * @param pO The object context (Room or other) to determine the string format.
051 * @return A string listing all items and their weights, or a message if no items exist.
052 */
053    
054    public String getAllItemString(final Object pO) {
055        StringBuilder vSb;
056        int index = 0;
057        if (pO instanceof Room) {
058            if (this.aItemList.isEmpty()) return ".\nNo item here. ";
059            vSb = new StringBuilder("\nItems available :");
060
061        }
062            
063        else {
064            if (this.aItemList.isEmpty()) return "\nYou are not carrying any items.";
065            vSb = new StringBuilder("Your items -> ");
066
067        }
068        
069        
070        for (String itemName : this.aItemList.keySet()) {
071            vSb.append(itemName +" (" + this.getItem(itemName).getItemWeigth() + ")").append(index == this.aItemList.size() - 1 ? "" : " / ");
072            index++;
073        }
074     
075        return vSb.toString();
076    }
077    
078 
079    
080}
